Then thereÃ¢Â€â„¢s the wildlife: the mountain gorillas of the Bwindi Impenetrable Forest in Uganda; the epic wildebeest migration from TanzaniaÃ¢Â€â„¢s Serengeti to the Maasai Mara in Kenya; the Kruger National Park, home to the Big Five. Our lead feature in The Africa Collection by National Geographic Traveller (UK) looks at the destinations and experiences that will be taking travellers by storm in 2017 â€” first stop, ZambiaÃ¢Â€â„¢s remote Luangwa Valley for a yoga safari. The Africa Collection is part of a series of beautiful coffee table magazines distributed with National Geographic Traveller (UK), and also includes The Luxury Collection and The Spa & Wellness Collection.
